mapper.insert: INSERT INTO singo(singono, contents, rdate, memberno, trashno, files, filesaved,thumb,filesize) VALUES(community_seq.nextval, #{contents}, sysdate, #{memberno}, #{trashno}, #{files}, #{filesaved}, #{thumb}, #{filesize})
mapper.select:
SELECT singono, contents, rdate, memberno, trashno, files, filesaved, thumb, filesize, nickname, name , r FROM ( SELECT singono, contents, rdate, memberno, trashno, files, filesaved, thumb, filesize, nickname, name, rownum as r FROM ( SELECT singo.singono, singo.contents, singo.rdate, singo.memberno, singo.trashno, singo.files, singo.filesaved, singo.thumb, singo.filesize, member.nickname, trash.name FROM singo INNER JOIN member ON singo.memberno = member.memberno INNER JOIN trash ON singo.trashno = trash.trashno
WHERE (UPPER(singo.contents) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{word})||'%' OR UPPER(member.nickname) LIKE '%' ||UPPER(#{word})||'%' OR UPPER(trash.name) LIKE '%' ||UPPER(#{word})||'%')
ORDER BY singo.rdate DESC ) ) WHERE r >= #{start_num} AND r <= #{end_num} ORDER BY rdate DESC

SELECT count(*) AS CNT FROM singo,member,trash WHERE singo.memberno=member.memberno AND singo.trashno=trash.trashno
AND (UPPER(singo.contents) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{word})||'%' OR UPPER(member.nickname) LIKE '%' ||UPPER(#{word})||'%' OR UPPER(trash.name) LIKE '%' ||UPPER(#{word})||'%')

SELECT singono, contents, rdate, memberno, trashno, files FROM singo WHERE trashno IN (SELECT trashno FROM trash WHERE name LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%') OR memberno IN (SELECT memberno FROM member WHERE name LIKE '%' || #{word}|| '%') OR contents LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' ORDER BY rdate ASC
